dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 430 IH: Securing Access to Lower Taxes by ensuring Deductibility Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Garbarino (for himself, Mr. Gottheimer, Mrs. Kim, Mr. Menendez, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, Mr. Schneider, Mr. Lawler, Mr. Suozzi, Mr. Casten, Ms. Norton, Mr. Davis of Illinois, Mr. Kean, Ms. Chu, Ms. Brownley, Mr. Nadler, Ms. Sherrill, Ms. Gillen, Mr. Panetta, Mr. Ryan, Mr. Raskin, and Mr. Gomez) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the limitation on the deduction for certain taxes, including State and local property and income taxes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Securing Access to Lower Taxes by ensuring Deductibility Act or the SALT Deductibility Act.

section.header: Repeal of limitation on deduction for State and local, etc. taxes

subsection.text: Section 164(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking paragraph (6).
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
